Summary: Bright blue and red and white lights flashing very brightAt home looking at the sky
divs: sighting detailsat home looking at the stars then noticed this flashing red and blue and bright white lights so i ran and got the binoculars and was able to see it better,it did not move for three 1\2 hours. i had seen this once before in november 2012 in this same spot but it hovered 30 min.then it took off real fast just like it did this time.it was so exciting!
